<style type="text/css">#menu-container{display:none}</style><nav id="menu-container" class="regua-navegacao-tab menu-container menu-no-animation"><div id="menu-rounder" class="menu-rounder"><div id="menu-cascade" class="menu-cascade" data-menu-index="0"><ul class="menu-root menu-level menu-level-0"><li class="menu-item is-father " id="menu-1-futebol"><a class="menu-level menu-submenu menu-submenu-level1  menu-submenu-column-1"><a class="menu-submenu-title menu-item-back"><span class="menu-item-arrow menu-navegacao-color"></span><span                 </h3></div></div></div></div></div><ul class="gui-navigation-dots js-navigation-dots" data-track-action="interacoes"><li class="navigation-dot" data-track-click="subpaginacao"></li></ul></div><a class="showtime__arrow showtime__arrow--left" href="#" data-track-action="interacoes" data-track-click="esquerda" data-track-noninteraction="true"><svg class="showtime__arrow--svg" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 0 30.748 52.669"><path class="showtime__arrow-path gui-fill-primary" d="M0.878,28.455L24.212,51.79c1.172,1.172,3.071,1.172,4.243,0l1.415-1.414c1.171-1.172,1.171-3.071,0-4.242L10.071,26.334L29.87,6.535c1.171-1.172,1.171-3.07,0-4.242l-1.415-1.414c-1.171-1.172-3.071-1.172-4.243,0L0.878,24.213C-0.293,25.385-0.293,27.284,0.878,28.455z"/></svg></a><a class="showtime__arrow showtime__arrow--right" href="#" data-track-action="interacoes" data-track-click="direita" data-track-noninteraction="true"><svg class="showtime__arrow--svg" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 0 30.748 52.669"><path class="showtime__arrow-path gui-fill-primary" d="M29.87,24.214L6.536,0.879c-1.172-1.172-3.071-1.172-4.243,0L0.878,2.293c-1.171,1.172-1.171,3.071,0,4.242l19.799,19.799L0.878,46.134c-1.171,1.171-1.171,3.07,0,4.242l1.415,1.414c1.171,1.172,3.071,1.172,4.243,0L29.87,28.456C31.041,27.284,31.041,25.385,29.87,24.214z"/></svg></a></div></div></div><script>

		<a class="marca-produto-diretorio" href="http://globoesporte.globo.com">globoesporte.com</a>

        	</li>
        
        	<li class="diretorio-indice">
        		<a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/futebol/campeonato" class="item">campeonatos</a>
        	</li>
        
        	<li class="diretorio-indice">
        		<a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/atleta" class="item">atletas</a>
        	</li>
        
        	<li class="diretorio-indice">
        		<a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/tecnico" class="item">técnicos</a>
        	</li>
        
        	<li class="diretorio-indice item-destacado">
        		<a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/noticia/plantao.html" class="item">últimas notícias</a>
        	</li>
        
        </ul>
    </div>
</section>

    var glb_realtime_map = {
        site: 'globoesporte',
        categories: ['home'],
        url: 'http://globoesporte.globo.com/olimpiadas/'
    };

    var realtime = function(realtimeLoaded, msg){
        if(realtimeLoaded){
            return;
        }

        $.getScript('http://s.glbimg.com/bu/rt/js/glb-rt.js', function(){
            $.ajax({
                dataType: 'jsonp',
                
                url: 'http://s.glbimg.com/es/ge/static/live/globoesporte/json/globoesporte-home-agregador.js',
                
                jsonpCallback: 'glbrealtime_callback',
                cache: true,
                success: function(json){
                    $.glbrealtime({
                        data: json,
                        debug: false
                    });
                }
            });
        });
    }

    var realtimeLoaded = false;

    $(window).on('load', function(){
        realtime(realtimeLoaded, "onLoad");
        realtimeLoaded = true;
    })

    setTimeout(function(){
        realtime(realtimeLoaded, "timeout")
        realtimeLoaded = true;
    }, 3000);

</script><link rel="stylesheet"
                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script>$('meta[name=theme-color]').attr('content','#004B88');</script><style>

.has-regua .areatemplate-esquerda .glb-feed-instance {padding: 8px 15px 0 15px;}

    FB.init({

<div id="r7-footer-portal-holder">
<div id="r7-footer-cols">
<ul id="r7-sitemap">
<li id="r7-sitemap-noticias" class="r7-cols">
<h3><a href="http://noticias.r7.com/" title="Ir para a página de Notícias">Notícias</a></h3>
<ul>
<li><a title="Ir para Bahia" href="http://noticias.r7.com/bahia">Bahia</a></li>
<li><a title="Ir para Brasil" href="http://noticias.r7.com/brasil/">Brasil</a></li>
<li><a title="Ir para Carros" href="http://noticias.r7.com/carros/">Carros</a></li>
<li><a title="Ir para Cidades" href="http://noticias.r7.com/cidades/">Cidades</a></li>
